#include <iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main() {
	int t,nop,nor,count=0,pie[100],weight[100],i,k,n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		count=0;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		scanf("%d",&pie[i]);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		scanf("%d",&weight[i]);
		sort(pie,pie+n);
		sort(weight,weight+n);
		for(i=0,k=0;(i<n && k<n);i++,k++)
		if(pie[i]<=weight[k])
		{
			count++;
		
		}
		else
		{
		
		i--;
		}
		
		
		printf("%d\n",count);
	}
 
 
	return 0;
}
